\n

jQuery UI toggleClass

\n
\n

Overview

\n
\n
[edit]

toggleClass( class, [duration] )

\n

Adds the specified class if it is not present, and removes the specified class if it is present, using an optional transition.

\n
\n
\n

Dependencies

\n
    \n
  • Effects Core
    • \n
\n
\n
\n

Example

\n
\n
  • Demo
  • View Source
\n

\n Adds the \'selected\' class if it is not present, and removes the \'selected\' class if it is present.
\n

\n 
$("p").click(function () {\n
      $(this).toggleClass("selected", 1000);\n
    });\n
\n

\n

\n 
<!DOCTYPE html>\n
<html>\n
<head>\n
  <link href="http://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jqueryui/1.8/themes/base/jquery-ui.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css"/>\n
  <script src="http://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/1.4/jquery.min.js"></script>\n
  <script src="http://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jqueryui/1.8/jquery-ui.min.js"></script>\n
  <script src="http://ui.jquery.com/latest/ui/effects.core.js"></script>\n
<style type="text/css">\n
  p { cursor: pointer; font-size: 1.2em; }\n
  .selected { color:red; }\n
</style>\n
  <script>\n
  $(document).ready(function() {\n
    $("p").click(function () {\n
      $(this).toggleClass("selected", 1000);\n
    });\n
  });\n
  </script>\n
</head>\n
<body style="font-size:62.5%;">\n
  \n
<p>Click me to toggle \'selected\' class.</p>\n
<p class="selected">Click me to toggle \'selected\' class.</p>\n
<p>Click me to toggle \'selected\' class.</p>\n
\n
</body>\n
</html>\n
\n

\n

\n
\n
\n
\n

Arguments

\n
    \n \n
  • \n
    \n

    class

    \n
    \n
    Type:
    \n
    String
    \n \n
    \n
    \n
    \n

    A CSS class to toggle on the elements.

    \n
    \n
    • \n \n \n
  • \n
    \n

    duration

    \n
    \n
    Type:
    \n
    String, Number
    \n \n
    Optional
    \n \n
    \n
    \n
    \n

    A string representing one of the three predefined speeds ("slow", "normal", or "fast") or the number of milliseconds to run the animation (e.g. 1000).
